title: Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         NPS  Looking to learn more? News  Stay connected with Lincoln Boyhood and get information about current events. Browse press releases and learn about what is happening at the park.  Photos & More Visit the park through the photo gallery, listen to the audio files and immerse yourself in the park's history.  History and Culture The story of the fourteen years Abraham Lincoln lived in Indiana begins in 1816 when the Lincoln family moved from Kentucky to the frontier land of Indiana.  Nature Learn about the park's wildlife and environment.  Education Use our lesson materials and the Lincoln Traveling Trunk to bring the story of Abraham Lincoln to your classroom.  Kids and Youth Learn how to be a virtual Junior Ranger.  Management Learn about the laws and policies that apply to Lincoln Boyhood and the staff that manage the park.
